trans-unit.source: Provides compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="ADO Data Control" />, which enabled you to create a connection to a database using Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects (<see langword="ADO" />).
trans-unit.target: 提供与 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="ADO Data Control" />之间的兼容性，使您可以使用 Microsoft ActiveX 数据对象 (<see langword="ADO" />) 创建到数据库的连接。

trans-unit.source: Use this control in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to use an `ADO` data connection.
trans-unit.target: 在从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用此控件以继续使用`ADO`数据连接。

trans-unit.source: For new development, you should consider using `ADO.NET` instead of `ADO`.
trans-unit.target: 对于新开发，应考虑使用`ADO.NET`而不是`ADO`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Comparison of ADO.NET and ADO](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/98f2c0cd-437d-4934-8be5-c174b6782cae).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[比较的 ADO.NET 和 ADO](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/98f2c0cd-437d-4934-8be5-c174b6782cae)。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Msdatasrc.DataSourceListener" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Msdatasrc.DataSourceListener" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an interface to monitor changes in a data set.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个接口以监视数据集中的更改。

trans-unit.source: The `DataSourceListener` monitors a data set for data members that are added, removed, or changed when the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC> is connected to a data source.
trans-unit.target: `DataSourceListener`监视数据集的数据成员是否添加、 移除或更改时<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC>连接到数据源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current row position is before the first row in a <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前行位置是否位于 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> 中的第一行之前。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current row position is before the first row; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前行位于第一行之前，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `BOF` and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOF%2A> return values are determined by the location of the current row pointer if this pointer is valid.
trans-unit.target: `BOF`和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOF%2A>返回值由当前行指针的位置，此指针是否有效。

trans-unit.source: If either `BOF` or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOF%2A> is `true`, there is no current row, and any attempt to reference <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> data causes an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一`BOF`或<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOF%2A>是`true`，没有没有当前行，并且任何尝试引用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>的数据会导致异常。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `BOF` and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOF%2A> properties to determine whether an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> object contains rows or whether you have gone beyond the limits of an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> as you move from row to row.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`BOF`和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOF%2A>属性来确定是否<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>对象包含行或是否已超出限制的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>随着从行至行。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" /> 时 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF" /> 采取什么操作。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOFActionEnum" /> 枚举，用于指定要采取的操作。

trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定的行为时`MovePrevious`按下按钮和的第一行<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>当前行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of records that are cached in local memory for the current <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> 在本地内存中缓存的记录数。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> that specifies the number of records that are cached in local memory for the current <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Integer" />，指定当前 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> 对象在本地内存中缓存的记录数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 50 records.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 50 个记录。

trans-unit.source: The `CacheSize` value tells the provider how many records to keep in its buffer and how many records to fetch at one time to local memory.
trans-unit.target: `CacheSize`值指示提供程序在其缓冲区和多少个记录一次提取到本地内存中保留的记录数。

trans-unit.source: For example, when set to 10, after opening the first <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>, the provider fetches the first 10 records into local memory.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当设置为 10，打开第一个之后<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>，提供程序到本地内存提取前 10 条记录。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, as you move forward from the current record, the provider returns the data values from the local memory buffer.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当您从当前记录向前移动，该提供程序从本地内存缓冲区返回的数据值。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you move past the last record, the next 10 records are fetched from the data source into the cache.
trans-unit.target: 只要你移至最后一条记录，接下来的 10 记录会从数据源提取到缓存。

trans-unit.source: While you can change value during the life of the cursor, the change only affects the number of records in the cache after the next fetch from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 尽管你可以将光标的生命周期内更改值，此更改仅在数据源的下一次提取后影响缓存中的记录数。

trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the duration, in seconds, that the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> waits for a command to return from the server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 等待某一命令从服务器返回的持续时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> that specifies the number of seconds to wait when a connection is being established.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Integer" />，指定建立连接时等待的秒数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 15 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 15 秒。

trans-unit.source: After this period of time has elapsed without completing the command, the provider raises an exception to the calling application and cancels the command.
trans-unit.target: 这段时间过后而无法完成该命令后，该提供程序引发的调用应用程序的一个例外，并取消的命令。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property optimizes the execution of the command.

trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`释放参数设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references.
trans-unit.target: 当处置参数是`true`，此方法释放由该控件引用任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When you override <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 当你重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="EndOfRecordset" /> event is called when there is an attempt to move to a row past the end of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" />.

trans-unit.source: An `EndOfRecordset` event may occur if the `MoveNext` operation fails.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current row position is after the last row in a <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前行位置是否位于 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> 中的最后一行之后。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current row position is after the last row; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前行位于最后一行之后，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF%2A> and `EOF` return values are determined by the location of the current row pointer if this pointer is valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF%2A>和`EOF`返回值由当前行指针的位置，此指针是否有效。

trans-unit.source: If either <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF%2A> or `EOF` is `true`, there is no current row, and any attempt to reference <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> data causes an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF%2A>或`EOF`是`true`，没有没有当前行，并且任何尝试引用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>的数据会导致异常。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF%2A> and `EOF` properties to determine whether an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> object contains rows or whether you have gone beyond the limits of an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> as you move from row to row.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF%2A>和`EOF`属性来确定是否<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>对象包含行或是否已超出限制的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>随着从行至行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is contained in the display area of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 显示区域的文本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the text.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" />，用于指定文本。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to communicate information such as the number of the current record to the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性将如向用户的当前记录数的信息。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents a user of an ADO <see langword="Recordset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示 ADO <see langword="Recordset" /> 对象的用户。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a user name.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含用户名的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The user-name syntax depends on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 用户名称语法取决于数据源。

trans-unit.source: When a `UserName` and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Password%2A> are supplied, the control uses the values to create a connection string (<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.ConnectionString%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 当`UserName`和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Password%2A>是提供，该控件使用的值来创建连接字符串 (<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.ConnectionString%2A>属性)。

trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 控件的 <see langword="Recordset" /> 中的当前字段更改之前发生。
